verses.verse: At that time <S%H6256><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me, Hew <S%H6458><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like unto the first <S%H7223><s%>, and come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me into the mount <S%H2022><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee an ark <S%H727><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%>.

And I will write <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the tables <S%H3871><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that were in the first <S%H7223><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> which thou brakest <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and thou shalt put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them in the ark <S%H727><s%>.

And I made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an ark <S%H727><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and hewed <S%H6458><s%> <S%H8799><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> like unto the first <S%H7223><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the mount <S%H2022><s%>, having the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> in mine hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the tables <S%H3871><s%>, according to the first <S%H7223><s%> writing <S%H4385><s%>, the ten <S%H6235><s%> Mitzvot <S%H1697><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto you in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%>: and the YY <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them unto me.

And I turned <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> myself and came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> which I had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and there they be, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> took their journey <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from Beeroth of the children of Jaakan <S%H885><s%> to Mosera <S%H4149><s%>: there Aharon <S%H175><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and there he was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> ministered in the Kohen's office <S%H3547><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in his stead.

From thence they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Gudgodah <S%H1412><s%>; and from Gudgodah <S%H1412><s%> to Jotbath <S%H3193><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> of rivers <S%H5158><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%>.

At that time <S%H6256><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> separated <S%H914><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8800><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto him, and to bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%> in his name <S%H8034><s%>, unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Wherefore Levi <S%H3878><s%> hath no part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with his brethren <S%H251><s%>; the YY <S%H3068><s%> is his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, according as the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him.

And I stayed <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%>, according to the first <S%H7223><s%> time <S%H3117><s%>, forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights <S%H3915><s%>; and the YY <S%H3068><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me at that time <S%H6471><s%> also, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> would <S%H14><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8687><s%> thee.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, take <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy journey <S%H4550><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, that they may go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, which I sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto them.

And now, Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, what doth the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> require <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of thee, but to fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him, and to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> with all thy heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all thy soul <S%H5315><s%>,

To keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2708><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> for thy good <S%H2896><s%> ?
Behold, the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%> is the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, the earth <S%H776><s%> also, with all that therein is.

Only the YY <S%H3068><s%> had a delight <S%H2836><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, and he chose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, even you above all people <S%H5971><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.
Circumcise <S%H4135><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therefore the foreskin <S%H6190><s%> of your heart <S%H3824><s%>, and be no more stiffnecked <S%H6203><s%> <S%H7185><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and YY <S%H113><s%> of lords <S%H113><s%>, a great <S%H1419><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, a mighty <S%H1368><s%>, and a terrible <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, which regardeth <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not persons <S%H6440><s%>, nor taketh <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> reward <S%H7810><s%>:

He doth execute <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and widow <S%H490><s%>, and loveth <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, in giving <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him food <S%H3899><s%> and raiment <S%H8071><s%>.
Love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye therefore the stranger <S%H1616><s%>: for ye were strangers <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Thou shalt fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; him shalt thou serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and to him shalt thou cleave <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and swear <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8735><s%> by his name <S%H8034><s%>.

He is thy praise <S%H8416><s%>, and he is thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, that hath done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for thee these great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible things <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, which thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Thy fathers <S%H1><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%>; and now the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.
